task: Get acquainted with the basics of GetX in Flutter. Learn how to implement features like snackbars, dialogs, and bottom sheets using GetX. Explore different routing mechanisms and understand the core concepts of state management with GetX, including reactive state management, GetXController, and GetBuilder.  This day will lay the foundation for your understanding of GetX.

task: Delve deeper into GetX's advanced functionalities, including unique IDs, workers, and internationalization. Master dependency injection and understand the roles of services and bindings. Learn how to fetch and display API data using GetX, explore Get Storage for local data persistence, and get familiar with GetView and GetWidget components. Get a taste of using Get CLI for development.

task: Build a practical Todo app using GetX and a Laravel API. Learn to fetch, display, save, update, and delete data from a server using GetX's GetConnect. Incorporate functionalities like pagination and handle internet connectivity changes. Explore image picking, cropping, compression, and upload using GetX. Implement local authentication features like Face ID/Touch ID using GetX.

task: Explore image-related functionalities using Firebase ML Kit, including barcode detection, image labeling, and text extraction. Learn how to work with ScrollController and ScrollNotification for advanced scrolling control. Discover how to implement carousel sliders, video playback with Chewie, draggable scrollable sheets, form validation, and drag-and-drop interactions. Explore speech-to-text functionality and create a persistent animated dynamic theme switcher.

task: Learn how to create a reorderable list view, implement a fancy animated bottom navigation bar, and build a signature widget with export functionality. Integrate Google Sign-in with Firebase using GetX.  Explore GetX Middleware for controlling navigation flow. Dive into interoperability with native platforms, calling Java code from Flutter and JavaScript from Flutter Web.  Understand how to dismiss the keyboard on tap and scroll. Learn to generate and scan QR codes.

task: Learn to make direct phone calls and copy phone numbers to the dialer. Explore the Scratcher widget and understand how to implement Eponymous/App Shortcuts using Flutter's Quick Action Library. Implement an expandable bottom sheet, double tap to exit functionality, and retrieve user location. Discover how to prevent screen shots and video recordings in Flutter. Explore the Stepper widget and build a database-driven dependent dropdown. Implement a password strength meter without using external plugins.

Discover how to create elegant number buttons, use number pickers, and build an expansion panel list. Learn to copy and paste using Flutter's clipboard and implement a keyboard-responsive floating action button. Explore techniques for searching and filtering list views.

task: Implement a loading button with an indicator. Explore flip card animations and learn to change the background color randomly on phone shake.  Discover how to create multi-select dialogs and multi-select dropdowns.  Build an animated circular menu and understand how to shrink a side menu.  Explore panorama integration with the image picker.  Implement review sliders and rating dialogs.  Learn to add confetti animations and create an app update checker.

task: Learn how to return multiple data types from functions.  Explore draggable expandable floating action buttons and video trimming.  Implement automatic redirection to login or dashboard from a splash screen.  Explore automatic SMS code reading and add dynamic items to list views.  Build an animated like button with saved state and liked count.  Learn multiple image upload using GetX and a Laravel API.  Explore circle rotating animations and select multiple items in list views.  Start building a multi-vendor eCommerce app using GetX, Laravel, and MySQL.
